What is TuxGraphics

= Introduction =

Tux Graphics boards are a great starting point for developing devices based on the atmega168/328/644 chips with a ENC28J60 ethernet chip.

Online shop:
http://shop.tuxgraphics.org/electronic/index-eth.html

Home page:
http://tuxgraphics.org/

= Disclaimer =

As of the date this page was created this project is not directly associated with TuxGraphics.  This project was just started by people who use there boards.
